name: Unlikely
description:
Made for the 2020 GMTK game jam (Theme was Out of Order)

All the 3d assets were made during the jam

Help: You have to aim after firing

Credits for the audio:

background music https://freesound.org/people/ERH/sounds/30192/

laser https://freesound.org/people/kafokafo/sounds/128229/

Metallic tick https://freesound.org/people/coobek/sounds/185609/

Fonts:

Orbitron (Google font)

https://kenney.nl/ (Most of the UI)
